result.eng: They left the country during the famine.
result.ga: d'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta
result.orig: d'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghorta
result.html: d'fhág siad an tír aimsir an ghortaThey left the country during the famine.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág siad an tír aimsir an ġortaThey left the country during the famine.

result.eng: What is wrong with your left foot?
result.ga: cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agat
result.orig: cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agat
result.html: cad atá cearr leis an chos chlé agatWhat is wrong with your left foot?
result.ponchtml: cad atá cearr leis an ċos ċlé agatWhat is wrong with your left foot?

result.eng: Where is your left hand?

result.html: cá bhfuil an lámh chlé agatWhere is your left hand?
result.ponchtml: cá ḃfuil an láṁ ċlé agatWhere is your left hand?

result.eng: Is that the woman who left you?

result.ponchtml: an í sin an ḃean a d'imiġ uaitIs that the woman who left you?

result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ga: ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin

result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.

result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh

result.eng: Who left the large pack of magazines here?
result.ga: cé a d'fhág an beart mór irisí anseo
result.orig: cé a d'fhág an beart mór irisí anseo
result.html: cé a d'fhág an beart mór irisí anseoWho left the large pack of magazines here?

result.eng: He threw on his uniform and left.
result.ga: bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.orig: bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imigh
result.html: bhuail sé a éide uime agus d'imighHe threw on his uniform and left.

result.eng: Turn left!
result.ga: cas ar chlé
result.orig: cas ar chlé
result.html: cas ar chléTurn left!
result.ponchtml: cas ar ċléTurn left!

result.eng: Some of the people were left unhappy.
result.ga: fágadh cuid de na daoine míshásta
result.orig: fágadh cuid de na daoine míshásta
result.html: fágadh cuid de na daoine míshástaSome of the people were left unhappy.

result.eng: Some of the money is still left.
result.ga: tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha

result.html: tá cuid den airgead fós fágthaSome of the money is still left.
result.ponchtml: tá cuid den airgead fós fágṫaSome of the money is still left.

result.eng: I left school full of hopes.
result.ga: d'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.orig: d'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchais
result.html: d'fhág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóchaisI left school full of hopes.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág mé an scoil agus mé lán dóċaisI left school full of hopes.

result.eng: I said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ga: d'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.orig: d'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.html: d'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh méI said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág mé slán ag mo ṁáṫair agus d'imiġ méI said goodbye to my mother and left.

result.eng: He left Connemara and took to London.
result.ga: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féin
result.orig: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féin
result.html: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág sé conamara agus ṫug londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.

result.eng: He left enough of the potatoes on the plate.
result.ga: d'fhág sé go leor de na prátaí ar an tábla
result.orig: d'fhág sé go leor de na prátaí ar an tábla
result.html: d'fhág sé go leor de na prátaí ar an táblaHe left enough of the potatoes on the plate.

result.eng: He left a note on the table.
result.ga: d'fhág sé nóta ar an tábla
result.orig: d'fhág sé nóta ar an tábla
result.html: d'fhág sé nóta ar an táblaHe left a note on the table.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág sé nóta ar an táblaHe left a note on the table.

result.eng: She left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ga: d'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.orig: d'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as

result.eng: They left without me.
result.ga: d'imigh siad gan mé
result.orig: d'imigh siad gan mé
result.html: d'imigh siad gan méThey left without me.
result.ponchtml: d'imiġ siad gan méThey left without me.

result.eng: He left Ireland.
result.ga: d'imigh sé as Éirinn
result.orig: d'imigh sé as Éirinn
result.html: d'imigh sé as ÉirinnHe left Ireland.
result.ponchtml: d'imiġ sé as ÉirinnHe left Ireland.

result.eng: She left like the wind.
result.ga: d'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe

result.html: d'imigh sí ar nós na gaoitheShe left like the wind.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.eng: Keep going to the crossroads and turn left.

result.ponchtml: lean ar aġaiḋ go dtí an crosḃóṫar agus tiontaiġ ar ċléKeep going to the crossroads and turn left.

result.eng: He has only left behind some short, lame writings.

result.html: níl ach cúig euro fágtha agamI only have five euro left.
result.ponchtml: níl aċ cúig euro fágṫa agamI only have five euro left.

result.eng: There only a couple of minutes left.

result.eng: I haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ga: níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil

result.eng: His wife left him.

result.orig: thréig a bhean é
result.html: thréig a bhean éHis wife left him.

result.eng: That one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar

result.eng: She left the sandwiches under the grill.
result.ga: d'fhág sí na ceapairí faoin ngríoscán

result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.orig: d'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: d'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: d'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin

result.eng: He left a letter for me at the reception desk.
result.ga: d'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilte
result.orig: d'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilte
result.html: d'fhág sé litir dom ag an deasc fáilteHe left a letter for me at the reception desk.

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: d'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: d'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn

result.eng: Only fragments were left.

result.orig: smionagar amháin a bhí fágtha
result.html: smionagar amháin a bhí fágthaOnly fragments were left.
result.ponchtml: smionagar aṁáin a ḃí fágṫaOnly fragments were left.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide

result.ponchtml: fágaḋ séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: Nothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ga: ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú

result.eng: I remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ga: is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé

result.html: is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh méI remember well the afternoon I left.
